amendment.description: To provide funds to repay accounts from which funds were borrowed for wildfire suppression.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1768 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1768 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S11816; text: CR S11816) To provide funds to repay accounts from which funds were borrowed for wildfire suppression.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1768 proposed by Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1768 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
